attr.title: Side Scape
attr.desc: Two old-school games collide in this Platformer/Dungeon Crawler hybrid. Join Captain Grisham and Sir Knight, as they set out to restore their worlds and stop the evil cyborg, Allegair. Switch at will between Captain Grisham and Sir Knight, each with a unique set of abilities; and perspective!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all files into the assets folder. You can also use the free demo from Itch.io. The game does have slowdowns on RK3326 devices.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2280510/Side_Scape/) and copy all files into the `assets` folder. You can also use the free demo from [Itch.io](https://mathangames.itch.io/side-scape-demo). The game does have slowdowns on RK3326 devices.
